title: Endeavour
description: Without further ado, Hentamine presents Endeavour. A suite of full orchestral arrangements of lush strings, soaring brass and majestic woodwinds, held together with tight percussion and coloured with piano and choir.
longDescription:
Preview the asset here;

https://soundcloud.com/hentamine/sets/endeavour?si=3430b284c85d47148e10668b19d6373d&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


Without further ado, Hentamine presents Endeavour. A suite of full orchestral arrangements of lush strings, soaring brass and majestic woodwinds, held together with tight percussion and coloured with piano and choir.


Endeavour is tailored for game development to not only provide the eight piece suite, but also contain over 100 loops so you can structure these pieces however you choose. We’ve also thrown in some additional loops with different arrangements from the pieces to provide you with as much content as possible.


These ornate orchestral works are ideal for cinematic sequences, highlighting the grandeur of RPG and Adventure games, or providing an interesting backdrop for city building and 4X games.


To get the most out of this product and learn how to make these pieces your own, please consult the 'Read Me' file.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Eight fully orchestrated pieces
  •  Over 100 loops
  •  Fully modular songs, use what we've provided to make the pieces your own

Number of Audio Wavs: 362

Number of Audio Cues: 362

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 35 minutes of full pieces, over an hour of loopable material

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://www.dropbox.com/s/rahsqyywybtb3zw/Endeavour%20Suite%20Read%20Me.pdf?dl=0

Important/Additional Notes: Support at hello@hentamine.com
